forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy. A steady rain this morning, with showers continuing this afternoon. High 14C. Winds SE at 40 to 65 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm. Higher wind gusts possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers for the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SE at 25 to 40 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch. Higher wind gusts possible.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with a steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 7C. SW winds at 30 to 50 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with a steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 47F. SW winds at 25 to 35 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 11C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 53F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 53F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low around 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 11C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 53F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 44F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High around 10C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 51F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low around 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High near 10C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low near 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 42F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High around 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 51F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Low 46F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High around 50F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
